title: American meatloaf
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 large onions, chopped', '2 large celery sticks, chopped', '1 large green pepper, seeded and chopped', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '1kg lean minced beef', '75g fresh breadcrumbs (white or wholemeal)', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '227g can chopped tomatoes', '4 tbsp tomato ketchup', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
